        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect from OBD interface

      • startODBReadings

        public void startODBReadings()
        Configuration of OBD interface and receiving data from it. Saving received information in database. When any error occurred, the device is disconnected.

        Returns:
        State of bluetooth connection
